summary: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?
cast: Cary Grant|Audrey Hepburn|Walter Matthau|James Coburn|George Kennedy|Dominique Minot|Ned Glass|Jacques Marin|Paul Bonifas|Thomas Chelimsky|Marc Arian|Claudine Berg|Marcel Bernier|Georges Billy|Albert Daumergue|Raoul Delfosse|Lucien Desagneaux|Stanley Donen|Colin Drake|Mel Ferrer|Jean Gold|Chantal Goya|Clément Harari|Monte Landis|Bernard Musson|Antonio Passalia|Jacques Préboist|Peter Stone|Anthony Stuart|Michel Thomass|André Tomasi|Roger Trapp|Louis Viret
title: Charada
